name: getBaseTagData
description:
Used within a custom tag. Finds calling (ancestor) tag by
 name and accesses its data.

params.name: tagname
params.description: Specify the parent tag name, starting with CF_

params.name: instancenumber
params.description: Specify the nth-level ancestor to retrieve variables from

links.title: Nesting custom tags
links.description: Working with nested custom tags in Adobe CF

examples.title: Retrieve parent tag thisTag scope
examples.description: Use getBaseTagData() to retrieve the execution mode of the parent CF_MAPPER custom tag.
examples.code:
<cfset tagData = getBaseTagData('CF_MAPPER')>
<!--- Find the tag's execution mode Located inside the --->
<cfif tagData.thisTag.executionMode neq 'inactive'>
template
<cfelse>
BODY
</cfif>

examples.title: Retrieve parent tag attributes
examples.description: Use getBaseTagData() to retrieve the attributes of the parent cf_iframe tag
